original_text: And Ephron dwelt among the children of Heth: and Ephron the Hittite answered Abraham in the audience of the children of Heth, even of all that went in at the gate of his city, saying,
korean_text: 에브론이 헷 족속 중에 앉아 있더니 그가 헷 족속 곧 성문에 들어온 모든 자가 듣는 데서 아브라함에게 대답하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: And Ephron dwelt among the children of Heth:
and Ephron the Hittite answered Abraham
in the audience of the children of Heth,
even of all that went in at the gate of his city,
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 그 성문에 들어온 모든 자의 앞에서
